Optional Field : (countryCode,phoneNumber) Or (email)
Mandatory Field : otp

request.description:
Possible values of reasonOfResend : RESET_PASSWORD,ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION
When sending resend for account verification, value should be ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION
When sending resend for resent password , value should be RESET_PASSWORD

Possible values of reasonOfResend : RESET_PASSWORD,ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION When sending resend for account verification, value should be ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION When sending resend for resent password , value should be RESET_PASSWORD

header.name: cache-control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: content-type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: transfer-encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: x-content-type-options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: x-frame-options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

request.description:
To be used to create post 
    Mandatory field is content , rest are optional.
    Created Post can't be public

item.name: list of user's post by user id

query.description: Field Mandatory, value could be empty

request.description:
Answers : can be as many as one want
postId : it is optional [0 should be sent when there is no post]

query.description: Use 0 for all result along with page 0

item.name: Submit Answer to post and view post

request.description: User first submits the answer and if answer are correct then post is shown
